alert.note: Alert for Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ASCENSION, NORTHWESTERN ST. JAMES, WEST CENTRAL LIVINGSTON, EAST CENTRAL IBERVILLE, SOUTH CENTRAL EAST BATON ROUGE AND NORTH CENTRAL ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Old Jefferson, or near Oak Hills Place, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Sorrento, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Geismar, Inniswold, Prairieville, Village St. George, Shenandoah, Belle Rose, Gardere, and Paincourtville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 161 and 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension
